title: That Thing You See a Lot!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Aaah, that was really fun-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That was a good movie~. That scene where they flew towards the sky was really impactful on a big screen, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, hey, can I ask you something, Mari?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>The thing the main characters ate.... what was it again? You know, that biscuit thing with marshmallow in the middle that they heat over the campfire, do people eat that while camping in America?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>They’re called S’mores. We eat them a lot. I used to make them not only for camping but also for barbecues~. They’re really good with chocolate fillings too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh, that sounds delicious! How nice, Ai also want to try eating one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, how about we call everyone and have a S’more party? I’ve never done it myself, but I think having it with strawberry slices or other fruits as fillings will also be delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It definitely will be! Ai wants to have a S’more party!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Okay! Then, let’s contact everyone♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
